title: Fish in farm dams
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Farm management - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Farm management - Australia
description: Shows aspects of the native warm water fish breeding program being carried out at the Island Fisheries Research Station, Narrandera, NSW. Also looks at the work being done by State Fisheries and the Water Resources Commission which benefits farmers.
